sanskrit_verse:
शूद्रो गुप्तमगुप्तं वा द्वैजातं वर्णमावसन् ।
अगुप्तमङ्गसर्वस्वैर्गुप्तं सर्वेण हीयते ॥ ८.३७४॥
transliteration: śūdro guptam aguptaṁ vā dvaijātaṁ varṇam āvasan | aguptam aṅga-sarvaisvair guptaṁ sarveṇa hīyate || 8.374 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: A Śūdra residing among the twice-born, whether concealed or unconcealed, diminishes all wealth when unprotected; when protected, he causes diminishment through total appropriation.
